title: Eco-Modern 5-Bedroom Duplex with Rooftop Oasis in Serene Gorna
description: Step into modern eco-conscious living with this spacious 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom duplex situated in the calm heart of Gorna. The home boasts light-filled interiors, a sleek dining area with natural light, and a thoughtfully designed co-working space—ideal for balancing work and lifestyle. Solar panels ensure sustainable energy efficiency, while a private rooftop deck provides a tranquil retreat or entertaining backdrop. At 190 sqm, this duplex perfectly blends comfort and environmental consideration within contemporary architecture.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the quiet Gorna district, this property offers a peaceful suburban vibe while remaining conveniently connected to central Lodz via robust public transport and well-maintained bike lines. The neighborhood is characterized by its tranquility, green spaces, and friendly atmosphere. Residents can enjoy relaxed streets, easy access to daily amenities, and nearby parks delivering a harmonious blend of urban ease and a calm lifestyle.
